DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: If enabled, humans who enter doors will automatically close them behind them when no other entity is following.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>close_doors</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Close Doors</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue> </myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData> ;Yes;No</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
